name: SetAdminAway
description:
Mark an admin as away in the Intercom Inbox.

This tool is used to set an admin's status to away in the Intercom Inbox. It should be called when there is a need to update an admin's availability status to unavailable or offline.

parameters.name: admin_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the admin to set as away in the Intercom Inbox.

value_schema.description: The unique identifier of a given admin

parameters.name: intercom_version
parameters.description: Specify the version of the Intercom API to use, such as '1.0', '2.5', etc.

parameters.name: admin_away_settings
parameters.description: JSON object containing 'away_mode_enabled' and 'away_mode_reassign' to update admin status and conversation assignments.

away_mode_enabled.description: Set to "true" to change the status of the admin to away.

away_mode_reassign.description: Set to "true" to assign any new conversation replies to your default inbox.
